data.Sentence_cn: 1908年，诺斯克利夫勋爵拿出1,000英镑，作为对第一个飞越英吉利海峡的人的奖励。
data.Sentence: In 1908 Lord Northcliffe offered a prize of £1,000 to the first man who would fly across the English Channel.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而一年多过去了才有人出来尝试。
data.Sentence: Over a year passed before the first attempt was made.

data.Sentence_cn: 1909年7月19日凌晨，休伯特.莱瑟姆驾驶“安特瓦特4号”飞机从法国海岸起飞，
data.Sentence: On July 19th, 1909, in the early morning, Hubert Latham took off from the French coast in his plane the 'Antoinette IV'.

data.Sentence_cn: 但他只在海峡上空飞行了7英里，引擎就发生了故障，他只好降落在海面上。
data.Sentence: He had travelled only seven miles across the Channel when his engine failed and he was forced to land on the sea.

data.Sentence_cn: “安特瓦特”号飞机在海上漂浮，后来有船经过，莱瑟姆方才获救。
data.Sentence: The 'Antoinette' floated on the water until Latham was picked up by a ship.

data.Sentence_cn: 两天之后，路易斯.布莱里奥驾驶一名为“11号”的飞机来到加来附近。
data.Sentence: Two days later, Louis Bleriot arrived near Calais with a plane called 'No. XI'.

data.Sentence_cn: 布莱里奥从1905年起便开始研制飞机，“11号”飞机是他制作的最新型号。
data.Sentence: Bleriot had been making planes since 1905 and this was his latest model.

data.Sentence_cn: 一周以前，他曾成功地进行了一次26英里的陆上飞行。
data.Sentence: A week before, he had completed a successful overland flight during which he covered twenty-six miles.

data.Sentence_cn: 但是莱瑟姆不肯轻易罢休。
data.Sentence: Latham, however, did not give up easily.

data.Sentence_cn: 同一天，他驾驶一架新的“安特瓦特”号飞机来到了加来附近。
data.Sentence: He, too, arrived near Calais on the same day with a new 'Antoinette'.

data.Sentence_cn: 看来会有一场激烈的飞越英吉利海峡的竞争。
data.Sentence: It looked as if there would be an exciting race across the Channel.

data.Sentence_cn: 两天飞机都打算在7月25日起飞，
data.Sentence: Both planes were going to take off on July 25th,

data.Sentence_cn: 但莱瑟姆那天起床晚了。
data.Sentence: but Latham failed to get up early enough,

data.Sentence_cn: 布莱里奥凌晨4点15分作了一次短距离试飞，半小时后便正式出发了。
data.Sentence: After making a short test flight at 4:15 a.m., Bleriot set off half an hour later.

data.Sentence_cn: 他这次伟大的飞行持续了37分钟。
data.Sentence: His great flight lasted thirty-seven minutes.

data.Sentence_cn: 当他在多佛着陆后，第一个迎接他的是当地一名警察。
data.Sentence: When he landed near Dover, the first person to greet him was a local policeman.

data.Sentence_cn: 莱瑟姆一周以后也作了一次尝试，飞到离多佛不到半英里的地方。这次他又遭厄运，
data.Sentence: Latham made another attempt a week later and got within half a mile of Dover, but he was unlucky again.

data.Sentence_cn: 因引擎故障第二次降落在海面上。
data.Sentence: His engine failed and he landed on the sea for the second time.
